This page is automatically generated by the data_page_generator.rb plugin, based on the _layouts/job.html template.

Use the _config.yml to specify the rules for generating pages like this one (including name and template).

In the template, you have access to all the fields defined in data for the record, like, for instance:

Date,Company,Location,Title,Summary,Responsibilities,Skills,Min_Qualifications,Preferred_Qualifications

  • Visual Designer - Marketing Design
  • We are looking for an outstanding visual designer to join our team. Applicant will be working with cross-functional teams such as iTunes Marketing, iTunes Content Design, iTunes UI Design and outside agencies — so teamwork is a must. Applicant will be responsible for visual design; including branding, user interface design, and social media (Facebook, Twitter) — all within specified guidelines and deadlines. Design: Excellent visual design skills, logo/brand identity, typography, color theory and photography. Team Player: Smart, organized, efficient, and attentive to detail. Able to take direction but also make decisions independently.
Additionally, you also have access to page.name, which is the filename of the page, that is: index.html.
